shift+f\\\",\\r\\n        \\\"command\\\": \\\"findrelated.show\\\",\\r\\n        \\\"when\\\": \\\"editorFocus\\\"\\r\\n    },\\r\\n\\r\\n    // Find symbol in project\\r\\n    {\\r\\n Misc\\r\\n    ////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////\\r\\n\\r\\n    // Increase font size\\r\\n    {\\r\\n        \\\"key\\\": \\\"ctrl+x ctrl+=\\\",\\r\\n        \\\"command\\\": \\\"editor.action.fontZoomIn\\\"\\r\\n    },\\r\\n\\r\\n    // Decrease font size\\r\\n    {\\r\\n        \\\"key\\\": \\\"ctrl+x ctrl+-\\\",\\r\\n        \\\"command\\\": Mac.\\r\\n    // {\\r\\n    //     \\\"key\\\": \\\"ctrl+a\\\",\\r\\n    //     \\\"command\\\": \\\"-cursorLineStart\\\",\\r\\n    //     \\\"when\\\": \\\"textInputFocus\\\"\\r\\n    // },\\r\\n    {\\r\\n        \\\"key\\\": \\\"ctrl+a\\\",\\r\\n        \\\"command\\\": \\\"cursorHome\\\",\\r\\n        \\\"when\\\": \\\"editorTextFocus && !editorHasSelection\\\"\\r\\n    },\\r\\n    {\\r\\n needs to be removed on Mac.\\r\\n    // {\\r\\n    //     \\\"key\\\": \\\"ctrl+e\\\",\\r\\n    //     \\\"command\\\": \\\"-cursorLineEnd\\\",\\r\\n    //     \\\"when\\\": \\\"textInputFocus\\\"\\r\\n    // },\\r\\n    //\\r\\n    // Go to end of line\\r\\n    //\\r\\n    {\\r\\n        \\\"key\\\": \\\"ctrl+e\\\",\\r\\n        \\\"command\\\": \\\"cursorEnd\\\",\\r\\n        \\\"when\\\": \\\"editorTextFocus && !editorHasSelection\\\"\\r\\n    },\\r\\n    {\\r\\n        \\\"key\\\": \\\"ctrl+e\\\",\\r\\n        \\\"command\\\": \\\"cursorEndSelect\\\",\\r\\n        \\\"when\\\": \\\"editorTextFocus && editorHasSelection\\\"\\r\\n    },\\r\\n\\r\\n    //\\r\\n    // Go to previous line (up)\\r\\n    //\\r\\n    {\\r\\n        \\\"key\\\": \\\"ctrl+p\\\",\\r\\n {\\r\\n        \\\"key\\\": \\\"shift+alt+,\\\",\\r\\n        \\\"command\\\": \\\"cursorTop\\\",\\r\\n        \\\"when\\\": \\\"editorTextFocus && !editorHasSelection\\\"\\r\\n    },\\r\\n    {\\r\\n        \\\"key\\\": \\\"shift+alt+,\\\",\\r\\n        \\\"command\\\": \\\"cursorTopSelect\\\",\\r\\n        \\\"when\\\": \\\"editorTextFocus && editorHasSelection\\\"\\r\\n    },\\r\\n\\r\\n    //\\r\\n    // Go to bottom of file\\r\\n    //\\r\\n    {\\r\\n        \\\"key\\\": \\\"shift+alt+.\\\",\\r\\n        \\\"command\\\": \\\"cursorBottom\\\",\\r\\n        \\\"when\\\": \\\"editorTextFocus && !editorHasSelection\\\"\\r\\n    },\\r\\n    {\\r\\n        \\\"key\\\": \\\"shift+alt+.\\\",\\r\\n        \\\"command\\\": \\\"cursorBottomSelect\\\",\\r\\n        \\\"when\\\": \\\"editorTextFocus && editorHasSelection\\\"\\r\\n    },\\r\\n\\r\\n    //\\r\\n    // Go to next line (down)\\r\\n    //\\r\\n    {\\r\\n        \\\"key\\\": \\\"ctrl+n\\\",\\r\\n \\\"command\\\": \\\"cursorDownSelect\\\",\\r\\n        \\\"when\\\": \\\"editorTextFocus && editorHasSelection\\\"\\r\\n    },\\r\\n\\r\\n    //\\r\\n    // Go forwarnd one character\\r\\n    //\\r\\n    // This keybinding needs to be removed on Windows.\\r\\n    {\\r\\n        \\\"key\\\": \\\"ctrl+f\\\",\\r\\n        \\\"command\\\": \\\"-actions.find\\\",\\r\\n    },\\r\\n    {\\r\\n Go backward one character\\r\\n    //\\r\\n    // This keybinding needs to be removed on Windows.\\r\\n    {\\r\\n        \\\"key\\\": \\\"ctrl+b\\\",\\r\\n        \\\"command\\\": \\\"-workbench.action.quickOpen\\\"\\r\\n    },\\r\\n    {\\r\\n        \\\"key\\\": \\\"ctrl+b\\\",\\r\\n        \\\"command\\\": \\\"cursorLeft\\\",\\r\\n        \\\"when\\\": \\\"editorTextFocus && cursor position stack\\r\\n    //\\r\\n    {\\r\\n        \\\"key\\\": \\\"ctrl+m f\\\",\\r\\n        \\\"command\\\": \\\"workbench.action.navigateForward\\\",\\r\\n        \\\"when\\\": ////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////\\r\\n\\r\\n    // Move to matching brace\\r\\n    {\\r\\n        \\\"key\\\": \\\"ctrl+m ]\\\",\\r\\n ////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////\\r\\n    // Movement within lists\\r\\n \\\"ctrl+n\\\",\\r\\n        \\\"command\\\": \\\"selectNextSuggestion\\\",\\r\\n        \\\"when\\\": \\\"suggestWidgetMultipleSuggestions && suggestWidgetVisible && textInputFocus\\\"\\r\\n    },\\r\\n\\r\\n    // Quick open\\r\\n    {\\r\\n        \\\"key\\\": \\\"ctrl+p\\\",\\r\\n        \\\"command\\\": \\\"workbench.action.quickOpenSelectPrevious\\\",\\r\\n        \\\"when\\\": \\\"inQuickOpen\\\"\\r\\n    },\\r\\n\\r\\n    ////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////\\r\\n    // Scrolling\\r\\n    ////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////\\r\\n    {\\r\\n        \\\"key\\\": \\\"ctrl+up\\\",\\r\\n        \\\"command\\\": \\\"scrollLineUp\\\",\\r\\n \\\"editorTextFocus\\\"\\r\\n    },\\r\\n\\r\\n    ////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////\\r\\n    // Selection (ctrl+g)\\r\\n    ////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////\\r\\n\\r\\n    //\\r\\n    // Shrink selection\\r\\n    //\\r\\n    // This keybinding needs to be removed on Mac.\\r\\n    // {\\r\\n    //     \\\"key\\\": \\\"ctrl+-\\\",\\r\\n    //     \\\"command\\\": \\\"-workbench.action.navigateBack\\\"\\r\\n    // },\\r\\n    {\\r\\n        \\\"key\\\": \\\"ctrl+-\\\",\\r\\n Cancel selection\\r\\n    //\\r\\n    // This keybinding needs to be removed on Mac.\\r\\n    // {\\r\\n    //     \\\"key\\\": \\\"ctrl+o\\\",\\r\\n    //     \\\"command\\\": \\\"-lineBreakInsert\\\",\\r\\n    //     \\\"when\\\": \\\"textInputFocus && !editorReadonly\\\"\\r\\n    // },\\r\\n    // This keybinding needs to be removed on Windows.\\r\\n    {\\r\\n        \\\"key\\\": \\\"ctrl+o\\\",\\r\\n        \\\"command\\\": \\\"-workbench.action.files.openFile\\\"\\r\\n    },\\r\\n    {\\r\\n        \\\"key\\\": \\\"ctrl+o\\\",\\r\\n        \\\"command\\\": \\\"cancelSelection\\\",\\r\\n        \\\"when\\\": \\\"editorTextFocus && editorHasSelection\\\"\\r\\n    },\\r\\n    {\\r\\n        \\\"key\\\": \\\"ctrl+o\\\",\\r\\n        \\\"command\\\": \\\"hideSuggestWidget\\\",\\r\\n        \\\"when\\\": \\\"suggestWidgetVisible && textInputFocus\\\"\\r\\n    },\\r\\n    // This keybinding needs to be removed on Mac.\\r\\n    // {\\r\\n    //     \\\"key\\\": \\\"ctrl+shift+g\\\",\\r\\n    //     \\\"command\\\": \\\"-workbench.view.scm\\\"\\r\\n    // },\\r\\n    //\\r\\n    // Select next find match\\r\\n    //\\r\\n    {\\r\\n        \\\"key\\\": \\\"ctrl+shift+g\\\",\\r\\n        \\\"command\\\": \\\"editor.action.addSelectionToNextFindMatch\\\",\\r\\n        \\\"when\\\": \\\"editorFocus\\\"\\r\\n    },\\r\\n\\r\\n    // Start sticky selection\\r\\n    {\\r\\n        \\\"key\\\": \\\"ctrl+; s\\\",\\r\\n        \\\"command\\\": \\\"cursorRightSelect\\\",\\r\\n        \\\"when\\\": \\\"editorTextFocus && !editorReadonly\\\"\\r\\n    },\\r\\n\\r\\n    ////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////\\r\\n    // Cut/Copy/Paste\\r\\n    ////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////\\r\\n\\r\\n    //\\r\\n    // Cutting\\r\\n    //\\r\\n    // This keybinding needs to be removed on Mac.\\r\\n    // {\\r\\n    //     \\\"key\\\": \\\"ctrl+k\\\",\\r\\n    //     \\\"command\\\": \\\"-deleteAllRight\\\",\\r\\n    //     \\\"when\\\": \\\"textInputFocus && !editorReadonly\\\"\\r\\n    // },\\r\\n    {\\r\\n        // When ctrl+k and selection exists, just cut the selection to ring.\\r\\n        \\\"key\\\": \\\"ctrl+k\\\",\\r\\n        \\\"command\\\": \\\"editor.action.clipboardCutAction\\\",\\r\\n        \\\"when\\\": \\\"editorTextFocus && !editorReadonly && editorHasSelection\\\"\\r\\n    },\\r\\n\\r\\n    //\\r\\n    // Copying\\r\\n    //\\r\\n    // This keybinding needs to be removed on Windows.\\r\\n    {\\r\\n        \\\"key\\\": \\\"alt+w\\\",\\r\\n        \\\"command\\\": \\\"-toggleFindWholeWord\\\",\\r\\n        \\\"when\\\": \\\"editorFocus\\\"\\r\\n    },\\r\\n    {\\r\\n        \\\"key\\\": \\\"alt+w\\\",\\r\\n        \\\"command\\\": \\\"editor.action.clipboardCopyAction\\\",\\r\\n        \\\"when\\\": \\\"editorFocus\\\"\\r\\n    },\\r\\n\\r\\n    //\\r\\n    // Pasting\\r\\n    //\\r\\n    // This keybinding needs to be removed on Windows.\\r\\n    {\\r\\n        \\\"key\\\": \\\"ctrl+y\\\",\\r\\n        \\\"command\\\": \\\"-redo\\\",\\r\\n        \\\"when\\\": \\\"textInputFocus && !editorReadonly\\\"\\r\\n    },\\r\\n    {\\r\\n        \\\"key\\\": \\\"ctrl+y\\\",\\r\\n        \\\"command\\\": \\\"editor.action.clipboardPasteAction\\\"\\r\\n        // No \\\"when\\\" because I want it to work everywhere\\r\\n    },\\r\\n\\r\\n    ////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////\\r\\n    // Editor Panes\\r\\n    ////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////\\r\\n\\r\\n    {\\r\\n        \\\"key\\\": \\\"ctrl+x 3\\\",\\r\\n        \\\"command\\\": \\\"workbench.action.splitEditorRight\\\",\\r\\n        \\\"when\\\": \\\"editorFocus\\\"\\r\\n    },\\r\\n    {\\r\\n        \\\"key\\\": \\\"ctrl+x 2\\\",\\r\\n        \\\"command\\\": \\\"extension.airlinerSplitEditorDown\\\",\\r\\n        \\\"when\\\": \\\"editorFocus\\\"\\r\\n    },\\r\\n    {\\r\\n        \\\"key\\\": \\\"ctrl+x o\\\",\\r\\n        \\\"command\\\": \\\"workbench.action.focusNextGroup\\\",\\r\\n        \\\"when\\\": \\\"editorFocus\\\"\\r\\n    },\\r\\n    {\\r\\n        \\\"key\\\": \\\"ctrl+x 0\\\",\\r\\n        \\\"command\\\": \\\"workbench.action.closeActiveEditor\\\",\\r\\n        \\\"when\\\": \\\"editorFocus\\\"\\r\\n    },\\r\\n    {\\r\\n        \\\"key\\\": \\\"ctrl+x t\\\",\\r\\n        \\\"command\\\": \\\"extension.airlinerSplitTop\\\",\\r\\n        \\\"when\\\": \\\"editorFocus\\\"\\r\\n    },\\r\\n\\r\\n    // Use ctrl+tab and ctrl+shift+tab to navigate across editors of all groups\\r\\n    // (instead of only within the active group as the default keybindings do).\\r\\n    {\\r\\n        \\\"key\\\": \\\"ctrl+tab\\\",\\r\\n        \\\"command\\\": \\\"workbench.action.quickOpenPreviousRecentlyUsedEditor\\\",\\r\\n        \\\"when\\\": \\\"!inEditorsPicker\\\"\\r\\n    },\\r\\n    {\\r\\n        \\\"key\\\": \\\"ctrl+shift+tab\\\",\\r\\n        \\\"command\\\": \\\"workbench.action.quickOpenLeastRecentlyUsedEditor\\\",\\r\\n        \\\"when\\\": \\\"!inEditorsPicker\\\"\\r\\n    },\\r\\n\\r\\n    ////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////\\r\\n    // Text Editing\\r\\n    ////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////\\r\\n    // This keybinding needs to be removed on Windows.\\r\\n    {\\r\\n        \\\"key\\\": \\\"ctrl+d\\\",\\r\\n        \\\"command\\\": \\\"-editor.action.addSelectionToNextFindMatch\\\",\\r\\n        \\\"when\\\": \\\"editorFocus\\\"\\r\\n    },\\r\\n    {\\r\\n        // Do not remove existing ctrl+d keybinding, because we still want that\\r\\n        // to work when there is a selection.\\r\\n        \\\"key\\\": \\\"ctrl+d\\\",\\r\\n        \\\"command\\\": \\\"extension.airlinerHungryDeleteRight\\\",\\r\\n        \\\"when\\\": \\\"editorTextFocus && !editorHasSelection && !editorReadonly\\\"\\r\\n    },\\r\\n\\r\\n    // Show definition in a popup.\\r\\n    {\\r\\n        \\\"key\\\": \\\"ctrl+; d\\\",\\r\\n        \\\"command\\\": \\\"editor.action.showDefinitionPreviewHover\\\"\\r\\n    },\\r\\n    {\\r\\n        \\\"key\\\": \\\"ctrl+; a\\\",\\r\\n        \\\"command\\\": \\\"wwm.aligncode\\\",\\r\\n        \\\"when\\\": \\\"editorTextFocus && !editorReadonly\\\"\\r\\n    },\\r\\n    {\\r\\n        \\\"key\\\": \\\"ctrl+; 2\\\",\\r\\n        \\\"command\\\": \\\"editor.action.copyLinesDownAction\\\",\\r\\n        \\\"when\\\": \\\"editorTextFocus && !editorReadonly\\\"\\r\\n    },\\r\\n    // This keybinding needs to be removed on Mac.\\r\\n    // {\\r\\n    //     \\\"key\\\": \\\"cmd+/\\\",\\r\\n    //     \\\"command\\\": \\\"-editor.action.commentLine\\\",\\r\\n    //     \\\"when\\\": \\\"editorTextFocus && !editorReadonly\\\"\\r\\n    // },\\r\\n    {\\r\\n        \\\"key\\\": \\\"ctrl+/\\\",\\r\\n        \\\"command\\\": \\\"extension.airlinerToggleComment\\\",\\r\\n        \\\"when\\\": \\\"editorTextFocus && !editorReadonly\\\"\\r\\n    },\\r\\n    {\\r\\n        \\\"key\\\": \\\"ctrl+k\\\",\\r\\n        \\\"command\\\": \\\"extension.airlinerCutToEol\\\",\\r\\n        \\\"when\\\": \\\"editorTextFocus && !editorHasSelection && !editorReadonly\\\"\\r\\n    },\\r\\n    {\\r\\n        \\\"key\\\": \\\"ctrl+; ;\\\",\\r\\n        \\\"command\\\": \\\"extension.airlinerAppendSemicolon\\\"\\r\\n    },\\r\\n    {\\r\\n        // Do not remove existing backspace keybinding, because we still want\\r\\n        // that to work when there is a selection.\\r\\n        \\\"key\\\": \\\"backspace\\\",\\r\\n        \\\"command\\\": \\\"extension.airlinerHungryBackspace\\\",\\r\\n        \\\"when\\\": \\\"editorTextFocus && !editorHasSelection && !editorReadonly\\\"\\r\\n    },\\r\\n\\r\\n\\r\\n    ////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////\\r\\n    // Folding\\r\\n    ////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////\\r\\n\\r\\n    // Toggle folding\\r\\n    {\\r\\n        \\\"key\\\": \\\"ctrl+; f\\\",\\r\\n        \\\"command\\\": \\\"editor.toggleFold\\\",\\r\\n        \\\"when\\\": \\\"editorTextFocus && foldingEnabled\\\"\\r\\n    }\\r\\n]\"}"}
